title: Sexuality and communication
brief_description: At an Ontario Science Center Symposium two doctors discuss many aspects of human sexuality in light-hearted but extremely scholarly explanations involving role playing, diagramatic representation of male and female sex organs, intercourse, premature ejaculation, frigidity, masturbation, and shows the importance of attitudes and feelings.
